First have to align everything against the reference genome
```Bash
D-MPXV_S179_L001_R1_001.fastq
D-MPXV_S179_L001_R2_001.fastq

E-MPXV_S180_L001_R1_001.fastq
E-MPXV_S180_L001_R2_001.fastq

I-MPXV_S181_L001_R1_001.fastq
I-MPXV_S181_L001_R2_001.fastq
```

Build a bwa reference
```Bash
bwa index MPOX_clade2_b1_ref.fasta -o index_bwa
```

Run bwa
```Bash
bwa mem index_bwa/MPOX_clade2_b1_ref rawdata/D-MPXV_S179_L001_R1_001.fastq rawdata/D-MPXV_S179_L001_R2_001.fastq > D_clone.sam

bwa mem index_bwa/MPOX_clade2_b1_ref rawdata/E-MPXV_S180_L001_R1_001.fastq rawdata/E-MPXV_S180_L001_R2_001.fastq > E_clone.sam

bwa mem index_bwa/MPOX_clade2_b1_ref rawdata/I-MPXV_S181_L001_R1_001.fastq rawdata/I-MPXV_S181_L001_R2_001.fastq > I_clone.sam

```
